item.description: Conducting calculus-based instruction on electrostatics and electromagnetism.

item.description: Intensive calculus-based course covering kinematics, dynamics, and rotation.

item.title: Tópicos Especiais em Engenharia e Ciência dos Materiais III – Biomaterials
